channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-16018] Better documentation of ReplicationPeers
item.description:
Some of the ReplicationPeers interface's methods are not documented and are tied to a ZooKeeper implementation of ReplicationPeers. Also some method names are a little confusing.

Review board at: https://reviews.apache.org/r/48696/

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

Why cache? ReplicationPeers is not caching anything AFAIK. 


+  public boolean getStatusOfPeerFromCache(String id) {

Oh ok, I think I was trying to differentiate from the getStatusOfPeerFromBackingStore(), but I could see how a future implementation of ReplicationPeers might not cache the statuses. I'll make this change. Thanks!
Doesn't apply cleanly. Joseph is going to post a rebased patch.
